roleset.name: to prepare

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: And in suburban Boston , developers are bracing for cutbacks in the computer industry , a major user of office space .
example.arg: for cutbacks in the computer industry , a major user of office space

example.name: with Arg1
example.text: So the senators must brace themselves .

example.name: Arg0,1,2
example.text: The CEO's bracing investors for a rough quarter at least served to lower expectations and cushion the blow of the final numbers.

roleset.note:
BRACE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'brace' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from brace.01-v predicate notes)
BRACING-N NOTES: (from bracing.01-n)

roleset.name: support, hold up, stabilize

example.name: Instrument seperate from arg 0
example.text: Dr. John's bracing of the leg with a cast

example.name: When there is no animate agent
example.text: The cast's bracing of her wrist

example.name: Verbal
example.text: The wall was braced with sixteen 12X12s.

roleset.note: BRACING-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from bracing.02-n)
